input.sentences: there was a ton of traffic as we drove into the city to catch the game .
after getting some food we found our seats to watch the game .
our team was winning just about the entire game .
at half time we got to see the cheerleaders dance and cheer .
the game finished up and everyone had a great time .
output.sentences: There is always so much traffic on Main Street that we were afraid we would not get to the game on time
We manage to get there at the beginning of the first quarter and crammed into two available seats in the middle.
Our team was starting to win and the crowd cheered.
Cheerleaders entertained us with a halftime dance
Finally just before the buzzer our team threw the winning ball and we all left with a feeling of elation.
